column4: Question. A user is trying to run a local program and open a file over samba. It says it cant find the file although it is browsable via the mapped drive in winxp. if the program is ran on the solaris box and X forwarded it can see the file.
everything is owned by nobody.nobody with permissions of 777 Feldegast
as i said... he can browse to the file in windows VIA the mapped drive.
